name: Virtual Time Capsule
description:
Made this over the past 48 hours for a class game assignment with the theme "Edutainment," a museum/time capsule pictures that resonate with me in 2020.

CONTROLS:
WASD to walk

Q/E to look left/right
Text will appear when close enough to some displays

Music: ECCOと悪寒ダイビング by Macintosh Plus
